entries.title_d: A ship bearing the Corellia Deep Mining Company logo has been spotted in the area. They have no operations this far out and should be investigated.
entries.title: Yavin System: Investigate the Corellia Deep Mining Co. Vessel
entries.split_quest_alert: Incoming enemy fighters detected. These are obviously the ships that were supposed to be picking up the supplies. Destroy them before they can report your presence.
entries.rescue_phase_2: Ok there you go. Remember keep the pressure on the those creeps and they will eventually fold operations.
entries.rescue_phase_1: They told me that you wouldn't be flying anything normal but I didn't quite expect you to be in that ship. Whatever...I have the supplies you need.
entries.rescue_abandoned: What are you doing out here? That's right, just keep flying.
entries.recovery_success: Corellia Deep Mining Co. ship preparing to make the jump to hyper space.
entries.quest_location_d: The current location of the ship is near your present position.
entries.quest_escort_d: Wait at your current location until the vessel leaves the area.
entries.quest_dock_d: The vessel is offering you payment, thinking that you are part of the mercenaries it hired to pretend to be Massassi. Dock with the vessel and take the payment.
entries.failed_destroy: Corellia Deep Mining Co. ship destroyed.
entries.docking_complete: Docking procedure completed. Transfered supplies for the Corellia Deep Mining Co. to your vessel.
entries.complete: Corellia Deep Mining Co. is obviously suppling these fake Massassi. They obviously are attempting to drive the Yavin Mining Company out of the system.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Ship locked. Ship is bearing the markings of the Corellia Deep Mining Company.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Gaining lock on the starship signature. Stand by.
entries.abort: What are you doing out here? That's right, just keep flying.
